trans-unit.source: By default launching gearbox without any subcommand will start the interactive mode. This provides an interactive prompt where gearbox commands, system shell commands and python statements can be executed. If you have any doubt about what you can do simply run the
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,启动齿轮箱不需要任何子命令就会启动交互模式。这提供了一个交互式的提示,齿轮箱命令,系统shell命令和python语句可以被执行。如果你对你能做什么有任何疑问,只需运行

trans-unit.source: Command line toolkit born as a PasteScript replacement for the TurboGears2 web framework
trans-unit.target: 作为PasteScript替代TurboGears2网络框架的命令行工具包诞生。

trans-unit.source: Each file ending with the _tmpl syntax will be processed with the Tempita template engine and whenever the name of a file or directory contains +optname+ it will be substituted with the value of the option having the same name (e.g., +package+ will be substituted with the value of the –package options which will probably end being the name of the package).
trans-unit.target: 每个以_tmpl语法结尾的文件都将由Tempita模板引擎处理，只要文件或目录的名称包含+ optname +，它将被具有相同名称的选项的值替代（例如，+ package +将被替换为–package选项的值（可能以包名结尾）。

trans-unit.source: Gearbox cames with builtin support for gevent, so serving an application under Gevent is just a matter of using gearbox#gevent as your server inside the server:main section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Gearbox附带了对gevent的内置支持，因此在Gevent下为应用程序提供服务只是在配置文件的server：main部分中使用gearbox＃gevent作为服务器的问题。

trans-unit.source: Gearbox is a paster command replacement for TurboGears2. It has been created during the process of providing Python3 support to the TurboGears2 web framework, while still being backward compatible with the existing TurboGears projects.
trans-unit.target: Gearbox是TurboGears2的Paster命令替换。它是在为TurboGears2网络框架提供Python3支持的过程中创建的,同时仍然与现有的TurboGears项目向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: Gearbox is based on a stripped down version of Cliff command line framework, you might want to consider Cliff for more advanced use cases and custom command interpreters.
trans-unit.target: Gearbox基于Cliff命令行框架的精简版，您可能需要考虑将Cliff用于更高级的用例和自定义命令解释器。

trans-unit.source: Gearbox will automatically load any command registered as a setuptools entry point with
trans-unit.target: Gearbox会自动加载任何注册为setuptools入口点的命令,并使用

trans-unit.source: Here are a few examples, this will replace all xi:include occurrences with py:extends in all the template files recursively:
trans-unit.target: 下面是几个例子,这将在所有模板文件中用py:extends递归替换所有xi:include的出现。

trans-unit.source: If you are moving your TurboGears2 project from paster you will probably end serving your application with Paste HTTP server even if you are using the
trans-unit.target: 如果你将TurboGears2项目从paster中移出,你可能最终会用Paste HTTP服务器来服务你的应用程序,即使你使用了

trans-unit.source: Inherit from the class and implement the get_description, get_parser and take_action methods as described by the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 从该类继承并实现本文档所述的get_description，get_parser和take_action方法。

trans-unit.source: Installing the TurboGears 2.3 development tools you will get access some some gearbox commands specific to TurboGears2 projects management, those are the
trans-unit.target: 安装TurboGears 2.3开发工具后,你将获得一些TurboGears2项目管理专用的齿轮箱命令,这些命令是

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to rely on regex and python for more complex replacements, like updating the Copyright year in your documentation:
trans-unit.target: 也可以依靠regex和python进行更复杂的替换,比如更新文档中的版权年。

trans-unit.source: Just by installing gearbox itself your TurboGears project will be able to use gearbox system wide commands like
trans-unit.target: 只要安装变速箱本身,你的TurboGears项目就能使用变速箱系统范围内的命令,如

trans-unit.source: Scaffolding is the process of creating a new component of your web application through a template or preset.
trans-unit.target: 脚手架是通过模板或预设来创建一个新的网络应用组件的过程。

trans-unit.source: The gearbox#wsgiref also supports an experimental multithreaded version that can be enabled by setting the
trans-unit.target: 该变速箱＃的wsgiref还支持可以通过设置来启用实验多线程版本

trans-unit.source: The gearbox gevent server will automatically monkeypatch all the python modules apart from the DNS related functions before loading your application. Not much more apart making sure that your code is gevent compatible is required.
trans-unit.target: Gearbox gevent服务器会在加载你的应用程序之前,除了DNS相关的功能之外,自动对所有的python模块进行monkeypatch。除了确保你的代码与gevent兼容之外,没有更多的要求。

trans-unit.source: The main difference with the paster command is usually only that gearbox commands explicitly set the configuration file using the
trans-unit.target: 与paster命令的主要区别通常只是变速箱命令显式设置配置文件,使用的是

trans-unit.source: The only difference is that your take_action method has to end by calling
trans-unit.target: 唯一的区别是您的take_action方法必须通过调用来结束

trans-unit.source: The reason for this behavior is that gearbox is going to use what is specified inside the server:main section of your .ini file to serve your application. TurboGears2 projects quickstarted before 2.3 used Paste and so the projects is probably configured to use Paste#http as the server. This is not an issue by itself, it will just require you to have Paste installed to be able to serve the application, to totally remove the Paste dependency simply replace Paste#http with gearbox#wsgiref.
trans-unit.target: 出现这种情况的原因是，变速箱将使用.ini文件的server：main部分中指定的内容来服务您的应用程序。TurboGears2项目在2.3使用Paste之前快速入门，因此这些项目可能配置为使用Paste＃http作为服务器。这本身不是一个问题，它只会要求你有粘贴安装为能够服务于应用，完全删除粘贴的依赖只需更换粘贴＃HTTP与变速箱＃的wsgiref。

trans-unit.source: When the run_template command is called Gearbox will automatically run the template directory in the same package where the command was available.
trans-unit.target: 调用run_template命令时，Gearbox会 在该命令可用的同一包中自动运行模板目录。

trans-unit.source: While the quickstart command will be automatically available, you will have to enable project scope plugins for gearbox before the other two became available. This will let gearbox know that you are running it inside a TurboGears2 project and so that the commands that only make sense for TurboGears2 projects will became available.
trans-unit.target: 尽管quickstart命令将自动可用，但是您必须为其他两个齿轮箱启用齿轮箱的项目范围插件。这将使变速箱知道您正在TurboGears2项目中运行它，从而使仅对TurboGears2项目有意义的命令可用。

trans-unit.source: While the gearbox.plugins section will let gearbox itself know that inside that directory the tg.devtools commands have to be enabled making
trans-unit.target: 虽然gearbox.plugins部分将让变速箱本身知道在该目录中必须启用tg.devtools命令，

trans-unit.source: Writing new gearbox template commands is as simple as creating a gearbox.command.TemplateCommand subclass and place it inside a command.py file in a python package.
trans-unit.target: 编写新的变速箱模板命令非常简单，就像创建一个gearbox.command.TemplateCommand子类并将其放置在python包中的command.py文件中一样。
